Parameter.name: SCListFilename
Parameter.Description: Name of the file with version controlled items

Parameter.name: IsSYNC
Parameter.Description:
If equals to 0 all tortoise-git calls are asynchronous
Otherwise calls are synchronous and import is automatically executed after git calls.

Method.name: InstallNamespaceStorage
Method.Implementation: $Replace(..#Storage,"^","^["""_..#InstallNamespace_"""]")

Method.name: DefaultTemp
Method.Implementation: $G(@..InstallNamespaceStorage()@("%defaultTemp"))

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content: // 8012 because this error has corresponding error message

Method.name: MakeError
Method.Implementation: $$$ERROR(8012,"Git",msg)

Method.name: TempFolder
Method.Implementation: $G(@..#Storage@("settings","namespaceTemp"),..DefaultTemp()_$TR($znspace,"%")_..#Slash)

Method.name: GitBinExists
Method.Implementation: #if $system.Version.GetOS()'="Windows" quit 0 #else if '$D(^||GitBinExists) { set ^||GitBinExists = ##class(%File).Exists($E(..GitBinPath(),2,*-1)) } quit ^||GitBinExists #endif

Method.name: GitBinPath
Method.Implementation: s binPath = $G(@..InstallNamespaceStorage()@("%gitBinPath")) q $case($E(binPath),"""":binPath,:""""_binPath_"""")

Method.name: NeedSettings
Method.Implementation: (..DefaultTemp() = "") || (..GitBinPath() = "") || (..GitBinPath() = """")

Method.name: InstallNamespace
Method.Implementation: ..#InstallNamespace

Method.name: AddSlash
UpdateSettings
GitCommand
Method.Implementation: ..GitBinPath()_" /command:"_commandName_ " /path:"""_..TempFolder()_""""_ $case(commandName,"clone":" /exactpath:"_..TempFolder(),:"")_ $case(itemName,"":"",:..ExternalName(itemName))

Method.name: IsMenuGitCommand
Method.Implementation: $F(..#GitMenuItems, ","_menuItemName_",") > 0

Method.name: IsContextMenuGitCommand
Method.Implementation: $F(..#GitContextMenuItems, ","_menuItemName_",") > 0

Method.name: IsImportAfter
Method.Implementation: $F(..#ImportAfterGitMenuItems, ","_menuItemName_",") > 0

Method.name: UserAction
AfterUserAction
Method.Implementation: q $$$OK

Method.name: IsNamespaceInGit
Method.Implementation: ##class(%File).Exists(..TempFolder()_".git")

Method.name: ExternalName
AddToSourceControl
DeleteExternalsForItem
RemoveFromSourceControl
IsCspFolder
Method.Implementation:
#dim extension = $P(InternalName, ".", $L(InternalName, ".")) q:extension="csp" 0
#dim filename = $system.CSP.GetFileName(InternalName_"/") q filename'="" && ##class(%File).DirectoryExists(filename)

Method.name: Type
Method.Description:
pkg -- package
prj -- project
csp -- csp-page or csp-folder. See IsCspFolder

Method.name: NameWithoutExtension
Method.Implementation: $piece(InternalName, ".", 1, $length(InternalName,".")-1)

Method.name: IsClassInPackage
Method.Implementation: $E(ClassName, 1, $L(packageName)) = packageName

Method.name: IsItemInProject
IsItemInCSPFolder
Method.Implementation: $E(InternalName, 1, $L(cspFolder)) = cspFolder

Method.name: FindInPackages
Method.Implementation:
#dim item As %String = "" #dim found As %Boolean = 0 f { s item = $O(@..#Storage@("items", item)) q:item="" continue:..Type(item)'="pkg" #dim packageName As %String = ..NameWithoutExtension(item)
if ..IsClassInPackage(InternalName, packageName) { s found = 1 s sourceControlItem = packageName q } } q found

Method.name: FindInProjects
Method.Implementation:
#dim item As %String = "" #dim found As %Boolean = 0 f { s item = $O(@..#Storage@("items", item)) q:item="" continue:..Type(item)'="prj" #dim projectName As %String = ..NameWithoutExtension(item)
if ..IsItemInProject(InternalName, projectName) { s found = 1 s sourceControlItem = projectName q } } q found

Method.name: FindInCspFolders
IsInSourceControl
FullExternalName
Method.Implementation: ..TempFolder()_..ExternalName(InternalName)

Method.name: NormalizeExtension
RoutineTSH
UpdateRoutineTSH
Method.Implementation: s @..#Storage@("TSH", ..NormalizeExtension(InternalName)) = $G(tsh, $H) q $$$OK

Method.name: RemoveRoutineTSH
Method.Implementation: k @..#Storage@("TSH", ..NormalizeExtension(InternalName)) q $$$OK

Method.name: DeleteExternalFile
Method.Implementation: #dim fullName = ##class(Utils).FullExternalName(InternalName) #dim ec As %Status = $$$OK if ##class(%File).Exists(fullName) { s ec = ##class(%File).Delete(fullName) d ..RemoveRoutineTSH(InternalName) w fullName, " for ", InternalName, " deleted",! } Quit ec

Method.name: GetTempFileAndRoutineTS
Method.Description: if temp file for InternalName not found return "0,0" in tempFileTSH
Method.Implementation: #dim filename As %String = ..FullExternalName(InternalName) set tempFileTSH = ##class(%File).GetFileDateModified(filename) set routineTSH = ..RoutineTSH(InternalName) //file not found or path not found or some other error s:tempFileTSH<0 tempFileTSH = "0,0" set tempFileTSH = $zdt(tempFileTSH,3) set routineTSH = $zdt(routineTSH,3)

Method.name: IsTempFileOutdated
Method.Implementation: d ..GetTempFileAndRoutineTS(InternalName,.tempFileTSH,.routineTSH) q routineTSH]tempFileTSH

Method.name: IsRoutineOutdated
Method.Implementation: d ..GetTempFileAndRoutineTS(InternalName,.tempFileTSH,.routineTSH) q tempFileTSH]routineTSH

Method.name: FixProjectCspReferences
LoadIfOutdated
ListItemsInFiles
ImportRoutines
ExportRoutinesAux
Method.Implementation:
#define Dir #define OrderBy #define SystemFiles #define Flat #define NotStudio #define ShowGenerated 0 #define Filter #define CspFile 5 #define Directory 9 #define CSPFolder 10
#dim rs As %ResultSet = ##class(%ResultSet).%New("%RoutineMgr:StudioOpenDialog") #dim ec As %Status = rs.Execute(path_$case(path,"":"",:"/")_"*",$$$Dir, $$$OrderBy, $$$SystemFiles, $$$Flat, $$$NotStudio, $$$ShowGenerated, $$$Filter) q:'ec ec while rs.Next() { #dim name As %String = rs.Get("Name") #dim isdirectory As %String = rs.Get("IsDirectory") #dim type As %String = rs.Get("Type")
if (type = $$$Directory) || (type = $$$CSPFolder) { #dim newpath As %String = $case(path,"":name,:path_isdirectory_name) #dim importedcnt As %Integer = 0 d ..ExportRoutinesAux(newpath, isdirectory, level + 1) } else { #dim InternalName As %String = path_sep_name if (type = $$$CspFile) && ($E(InternalName) '= "/") { s InternalName = "/"_InternalName } s ec = ..ExportItem(InternalName) } } k rs q ec

Method.name: ExportItem
ExportProject
ExportAll
Method.Implementation: $$$QuitOnError(..ExportRoutines()) q ..ExportSCList()

Method.name: ImportAll
Method.Implementation: $$$QuitOnError(..ImportSCList()) q ..ImportRoutines()

Method.name: ExportRoutines
Method.Implementation: #dim item As %String = "" #dim ec As %Status = $$$OK f { s item = $O(@..#Storage@("items",item)) q:item="" s ec = ..ExportItem(item) q:'ec } q ec

Method.name: ExportSCList
ImportSCList
Method.Implementation:
#dim filename = ..TempFolder()_..#SCListFilename #dim file As %File = ##class(%File).%New(filename) #dim defaultCspApp As %String = $system.CSP.GetDefaultApp($znspace) #dim eol As %Boolean
$$$QuitOnError(file.Open("R", 10))
#dim a while 'file.AtEnd { #dim s As %String = file.ReadLine(,,.eol) continue:s="" #dim item As %String = $Replace(s, "<cspapp>", defaultCspApp) s a(item) = "" } k @..#Storage("items") m @..#Storage("items") = a d file.Close() k file q $$$OK

Method.name: RemoveFolderIfEmpty
Method.Description: returns true if directory was deleted
Method.Implementation:
#dim rs As %Status = ##class(%ResultSet).%New("%File:FileSet") #define DirsFirst 1 $$$QuitOnError(rs.Execute(path,,,$$$DirsFirst)) #dim fileCount As %Integer = 0 while rs.Next() { #dim fullname As %String = rs.Get("Name") #dim type As %String = rs.Get("Type") #dim name As %String = rs.Get("ItemName") #define IsDirectory(%type) %type="D"
s fileCount = fileCount + 1 q:'$$$IsDirectory(type) continue:name=".git" if ..RemoveFolderIfEmpty(fullname) { s fileCount = fileCount - 1 } } if fileCount = 0 { d ##class(%File).RemoveDirectory(path) } k rs q 'fileCount
